participant_1.background:
I enjoy reading about cycling because of my family's passion for it.
my daughter just graduated college.
i have 4 pets.
i use to be a huge superman fan as a child.
my favorite food is tacos.

participant_2.background:
I love to spend my free time practicing bird calls and learning more about them.
i am 8 years old.
I start my day with a cup of coffee and a walk through Central Park.
I'd brag about my ability to help animals and make them feel better.
i sometimes get into fights.

content.text: Hi! I'm doing great today! How are you?
I'm doing well, thank you. I'm glad to hear that.
Thank you! I'm excited because I get to start bird watching today with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I used to love bird watching when I was a kid.
I'm excited to learn more about them. I'm also excited to see if I can identify any of the birds that I see.
I'm sure you'll do great! I have a lot of experience with bird watching, so if you have any questions, feel free to ask me.
Thank you! I really appreciate that. I'm not sure if I'll have any questions, but I'll definitely keep that in mind.
You're welcome! I hope you have a great time bird watching today.
Thank you! I hope so too.
It sounds like you have a lot of interests. Do you have any other hobbies or interests that you'd like to share?
I like to help animals and make them feel better. I also like to read and play video games.
Those sound like great hobbies! I'm sure you're really good at helping animals.
Thank you! I try my best. I love animals and I want to make sure they're happy and healthy.
That's really kind of you. I'm sure the animals appreciate it.
I hope so! I like to think that I'm making a difference in their lives.
I'm sure you are. You seem like a very caring person.
Thank you! I try my best
